Reviews.Title: awesome little phone
Reviews.Author: roxalot
Reviews.Content: Perfect size for a girl. fits in my pocket and does everything a $300 phone does for $24! This item is listed as refurbished but looks and acts brand new. see you later expensive iPhone!

Reviews.Title: Great phone, great price..
Reviews.Author: YourHeroJames
Reviews.Content: This phone is great, it does everything you could possibly want.. I was fortunate enough to get this refurbished for only $25.00 and it was a steal. It has about 300MB of system memory so you can install all of your favorite apps and some games. It's very fast and smooth. Also, there is no activation needed. If you wanted to use this as a WiFi only device, it works perfectly. I would recommend you buy this phone, especially if you're getting it for a teen as a starter phone.

Reviews.Title: good phone
Reviews.Author: Kazi Begum
Reviews.Content: Better than expected and looks new and great deal for $27. Has google play. N64 emulator works fine as my nexus

Reviews.Title: Excellent Seller
Reviews.Author: marie
Reviews.Content: Seller did an excellent job.  But a note to the user of the phone itself, good luck figuring it out. But once you have accomplish that you'll be good to go.  Do not expect Net10 to help.  The Customer service at Net10 Sucks.  Really.

Reviews.Title: Yessss
Reviews.Author: antoinette washington
Reviews.Content: Love it verrrrrry much I mean alot I am very happy I got this one it has a lot more

Reviews.Title: best 25 dollars I ever spent
Reviews.Author: Joseph Dawson
Reviews.Content: Best 25 dollar phone i ever bought. and the net10. Unlimited plan. for 50 bucks a  month great deal. thank.you

Reviews.Title: Awesome phone!
Reviews.Author: Jupi
Reviews.Content: I just bought this phone a few days ago and I love it! It's a great phone, fast, great graphics. I would definitely recommend this phone to anybody looking for an entry level smart phone.

Reviews.Title: Great phone came with everything as listed..
Reviews.Author: Jerri Hirsh
Reviews.Content: Great phone for a great price and has a warranty which is nice..So far so good..just what I was looking for.

Reviews.Title: Great Starter Phone!
Reviews.Author: AlyDee
Reviews.Content: We bought this phone for my son's birthday and he loves it! It's a great starter phone for a preteen. Basic functionality, durable (even more so with a case, I recommend the iTuffy brand), and a has good size screen.I would definitely recommend this phone for preteens, older folks, and people who don't try to keep up with the Jones' but not so much a teen/adult who wants all the bells and whistles. You will be disappointed. I however am not, it is exactly what I expected. Love this product!

Reviews.Title: Don't come to this phone looking for an app machine!
Reviews.Author: Matthew S.
Reviews.Content: While this phone is an android the memory on it is EXTREMELY limited.If you decide to update all the apps built-in to the phone it will pretty much be completely full leaving you without any space to install anything else, but if you ignore some updates and manage your space well you'll be able to get some on it.The screen is also meh, viewing angles are kinda bad so if you watch any type of video horizontally it will result in kind of a 'silvery' picture.All that being said it's not a bad phone and I've never had any trouble out of it, if you can find one cheap it's worth the money.

Reviews.Title: it was received before the expected datw.
Reviews.Author: Beverly gilbert
Reviews.Content: Its a nice phone serves purpose. It doesnt have the best service but for price theres no complaints. I dont have regrets.

Reviews.Title: love this phone
Reviews.Author: Courtney
Reviews.Content: It does everything I need. I can use my fitness apps and go online. Easy to use it was perfect for me

Reviews.Title: lg optimus lg35g
Reviews.Author: jacklynn collis
Reviews.Content: Love the phone easy to use the only thing is the 3g doesn't work all the time. Other than that it is a good phone and would buy another if anything happen to mine.

Reviews.Title: good phone
Reviews.Author: mike
Reviews.Content: A really good phone if your new to the touchscreen generation.don't get me wrong its a really good phone but the only bad thing i can be picky about is not a lot of internal memory.i give it 3 stars.

Reviews.Title: New phone
Reviews.Author: VP
Reviews.Content: Love ! Love ! My new phone this is just like a brand new phone not a single thing is wrong with it !! Love it

Reviews.Title: Good deal at $25...
Reviews.Author: Red Badger
Reviews.Content: which is what I paid for a like new refurb, but at $95 keep looking. There is an LG optimus extreme for $95 on amazon and it's a lot more phone, I got one for $40 refurbed but it is not currrently available.

Reviews.Title: Needs more ram
Reviews.Author: Amber Whitaker
Reviews.Content: 2nd one of these I have owned and both are horrible for their memory. No room on them for more than 4 apps. My only complaint though.

Reviews.Title: EXCELLENT!!!  :)
Reviews.Author: Jack
Reviews.Content: This is an EXCELLENT product and I would recommend it to any one shopping for anything close to it. Check at Amazon first!  :)
